title: Enhancing Programming Practical Competencies: Blended Teaching Methods Workshop for ICT-Integrated STEM Education

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can design and implement social interaction strategies for STEM projects utilizing ICT tools.
Learners apply cognitive design principles (reflective activities and instructional design) to create portfolios analyzing ICT’s educational utility.
Learners overcome technology anxiety through smartphone-based practice and feedback, then develop operational plans for ICT-STEM integrated classes.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
